lead_paragraph: The boat and its crew were taken Friday after warships fired warning shots at Chinese vessels suspected of illegal fishing, an Indonesian official said.

headline.main: Indonesia Confirms Seizing Fishing Boat in South China Sea, Defying Beijing
headline.print_headline: Indonesia Confirms Seizing  A Chinese Fishing Boat

snippet: The boat and its crew were taken Friday after warships fired warning shots at Chinese vessels suspected of illegal fishing, an Indonesian official said.
